review_text: This is our 2nd time staying at Twyla's, and it was as good as the first! We love this quaint, quirky, cozy place.
Exactly as advertised and as others had described on reviews. Clean and cozy.

This is a great little apartment to stay in for visits and we'll definitely book with Kyla again if it's available next time we're in Oshkosh! The apartment is well stocked with anything you might need and Kyla was proactive to reach out during out visit to see if we needed anything! I expected a small, cramped place based on the pictures and was pleasantly surprised by how spacious it actually was. The furnishings and decor were great and well thought out, it left us feeling like were staying in someone's home rather than some cheap hotel like many places do. The little gifts are thoughtful and certainly unexpected, showing that Kyla doesn't treat you like just another customer, you truly are a guest.
A great little spot, comfortable, and all amenities provided! Will definitely stay again!
Enjoyed the stay very much. Great location for our needs and very affordable. Thanks for a helping make a fun weekend great!
we had a wonderful stay it was a very nice place for the weekend.

Words cannot express how much every one of us loved Kyla’s place - from the instant we set foot into the place until the moment we had to leave!! Comfy, creative and inviting decor. Everything you could ever need in every room and more - kitchen, bathroom, bedrooms, living room. Truly relaxing and heartwarming weekend!! Cannot wait to visit again!!
Very good

This place is super cute (decorations). Nearly everything you could need is there. Kyla's parents are really nice. They left a few surprises too.
Internet speed was great (over 200 mbps). Off-street parking. Had AC but only in the living room and bedroom with two beds. A fan would have been nice for the master bedroom.
There is a street light that streams into the master bedroom but I do travel with a sleep mask so it wasn't too annoying.
I did have a few issues (three) with the keypad not working - they said it was the first time it happened. Hopefully the issue gets identified and fixed for future guests. They did quickly refund me the base rate for the night I was unable to get into the property due to the lock issue.
The stairs from the first floor landing to the unit are rather narrow due to the "turning" so this could be a difficult unit for someone with mobility issues to get into.
All in all, a good stay. If my son stays where he's at, I'll stay here again in the futur

Convenient location and a very well-kept apartment close to the heart of downtown Oshkosh. Kyla was a great host that had check-in details and all other logistics perfectly laid out to make our trip to Oshkosh care free.
The entry way was amazing and interesting. The Airbnb is just as decorated and special.

Nice place to stay, a quirky but not to quirky
Friendly they went above and beyond downtown is very nice lots of shops,farmers market and some bands on the square
We would stay again

This is a quirkily and delightfully decorated apartment in an older building close to downtown, convenient to the farmer's market and some good restaurants. It was cozy, charming and well-stocked with everything we would need. The owner left us some treats, which was very thoughtful (and delicious!). We will definitely return.
Awesome stay.really neat design schema
Kyla is always helpful, everything was great and the amenities are unique. Thank you very much!

We absolutely loved our stay in Oshkosh. The apartment itself was extremely charming and the balcony was great for morning coffee and breakfast. The location was a few blocks from Main Street and we really enjoyed being able to walk to the Farmers Market they hold on Saturdays.

Kyla made my first stay at an airbnb simply outstanding. She was always responsive to messages (and I had many), kind, and full of information to make our stay seamless. The check in process was simple. The description of the property and amenities were spot on. All the extras included in the bathroom, such as shampoo, body wash and other toiletries, hairdryer, curling iron, first aid kit, bath salts and special lotions were incredible. The bed was super comfortable and the property is located in a quiet neighborhood. The little kitchen had everything we needed. When we realized the refrigerator was not cooling properly on day two of our stay, Kyla was immediately responsive and brought over a small refrigerator so our food would not spoil. What can I say about the fun and unique decor? Loved all the little quirky and fun things that were lovingly placed in the space. I would love to come back when we are in the area!

Kyla's place was super fun -- so much to see inside the apartment alone! The decor was very lively and artistic. We received a surprise donut delivery one morning, and great suggestions to visit the local farmer's market. The place was very clean and offered many amenities, and was just a quick walk to Main St in Oshkosh, where we found some great coffee shops, bars, and some fun shopping.
Loved it! Super funky and cozy! Great for a weekend away with our littles. Lots of pillow options, cozy furniture and great shower pressure. We loved our stay and would stay again!
Easy to find and check in. Rooms were very clean.
Great place to stay in Oshkosh! Very comfortable and we loved the artistic decor!
Would definitely stay there again!
The place was great. Loved all the little decorations and all the items that the host included in the case we forgot something. We felt extremely welcomed here.

This is a very cool and unique AirBnB. From the moment you step into the atrium and head up to the apartment, the whole thing feels like a work-of-art, or like you stepped into a theater. Interesting antiques, movie posters, and other decorations throughout. Very quiet, peaceful, relaxing and cozy. Lots of personal touches and it’s clear the host(s) take pride in their space. Everything is very thoughtfully laid out. Lots of cool, artsy utensils and kitchen items. Big fridge if you need to store groceries. Immaculately made beds, and snacks and tea and other things set out if you need or want them. This is the second time I have stayed at this AirBnB and I hope to stay again next time I am in town. Highly recommend. Thank you for another great stay!
very adorable 🥰

Best thing is the bathroom*, especially if you just arrived and it’s super cold from the windy lake breeze. Why, because the heating vent is right next to the toilet, cooks you back into normal temperatures. Very nice for couples with young children especially if you have a baby, Kyla provides a large mirror that lays around 6ft by 3ft. A nestled area with 1/4 inch thick rug surrounded with abc, youth friendly, and wholesome books. Nice Johnson & Johnson baby lotions, soaps, and shampoos.
Great water pressure, so great shower experience, watch out for the little discretion of lightly warm water, to that melt your skins heat. Big tub so if you wanted to share the moment y’all aren’t going to have a toe jammin war for that water.
*(good toilet paper, not no Scott’s but that sweet, soft, strong. Charmin ultra-soft.)
The kitchen was a literal hurdle to different age, but it justiciable because many Wisconsin homes are over a 100yr old.
Little balcony. Beds don’t creak at all, its a blesn

Really cute place, very clean and lots of personal touches! Being so close to the college campus was really convenient for why we were in Oshkosh, but we could hear students partying outdoors until late at night. Kyla was great about getting the portable air conditioning set up on an unseasonably warm weekend which was so helpful!
Very cozy stay! We really enjoyed our time here. Great amenities, within walking distance of bars and restaurants. Quiet neighborhood. Kyla was great about checking in if we needed anything.
Very lovely decorated and cozy place to stay, we enjoyed and can definitely recommend!
Great place! Very clean and exactly as listed. Loved the little extras that were provided!
Super cute place with tons of extra amenities and thoughtful touches. And very clean! Thank you!

Everything is very nice and cozy. Convenient and practical.
There were no problems.
I advise everyone.
I will return if the need arises.

Charming and Cozy! This apartment is so cute! The host made sure that we had everything that we could possibly need and then some. The location is perfect! I was able to walk downtown and enjoy the Saturday farmers market, boutiques and restaurants. The stay definitely gets a 10 out of ten 10!

Fantastic location downtown. Go and check out the farmers market while you’re here every Saturday! It was great! Located near historical homes and very short drive to nice trails and parks. Great value for what you’re getting we would absolutely stay here again.
The place was so adorable and in the perfect area for what we needed. I recommend this place if your getting away for a weekend and want plenty of places walking distance.

Quirky but rather charming. The bedrooms and bath are fine but the kitchen is pieced together in a tight attic which is barely manageable. The best part is Kyla who is wonderfully responsive. We would stay here again.

This cozy little apartment was so incredibly charming! We can not express enough how awesome this stay was. If you're an artsy fartsy, this ones for you. The detail and attention Kyla put into this apartment really speaks to her dedication to being an incredible host. Absolutely recommend 10/10! Fast response and eager to accommodate. Thank you for a great weekend getaway!
Well-located, just what we needed for our visit and clean as a pin. Eclectic decor, nicely done. We had everything we needed and then some.
Nice spot! Clean and well taken care of.
This was our second time staying at this location. The host is very responsive and everything was as we expected. Will definitely be back.

Aiden's home was comfy and cozy. He has gone the extra mile to provide all the essentials you'll need. The beds were comfortable, and the shower has a rain shower head and plenty of hot water. Light switches were a mystery at first as to what they went to I would suggest bringing an extention cord or two.

We felt very at home in Aiden’s place. The beds were so comfortable with quality linens. The kitchen was well equipped. The shower in the bathroom is very nice. The washer and dryer with laundry detergent and dryer sheets was great. Neighborhood is very quiet. A short walk to the lake. Look forward to staying there again.

Place was pretty cozy and in a good central location to the rest of Oshkosh, had an issue with the dyer and being down which wasn't disclosed until after i asked why it wasn't working when i went to dry my laundry but Aidan was quick enough to respond and help come to a solution for the problem. Other than that place was nice and cozy, well laid out internally as well.

Highly recommend! Upstairs neighbors lied on me and I was threatened with eviction due to that, but I'm very understanding and respectful so I'm not going to blame the host and leave a negative/bad review. From a business/ renter point of view the host was very professional and respectful. if you're looking for a nice quiet clean place this is 100% the place for you.
Aidan's place accommodated my needs for my trip I would come back
Had a great stay!
Had fun in Oshkosh during restaurant week.

Cozy is the right word. It was a comfortable 2 large bedrooms for my husband and I and our adult daughter. Nice size kitchen and bathroom. While we didnt use the laundry they were large capacity machines. Might suggest shades for the bedroom with the French doors, but otherwise a very comfortable space.
Great place to stay in Oshkosh. House was very nice and the owner was easy to work with! Highly recommend!
Super comfortable and small apartment. The beds were very comfortable. The smart TV was a nice addition to sign into our accounts for our shows.

Nice place to stay. We were able to bring our dog. Well equipped place with everything you may need in a kitchen. Aiden communicated well and helped with any questions. In the summer it is probably a pretty area because it is so close to the water.
Aidan was a great host and very responsive to any questions we had. Would highly recommend and definitely stay again.
The place was super comfortable. Nice safe neighborhood to walk around. Lake is right around the corner. We enjoyed our stay! Thanks again.

This spot is an awesome value! We were so appreciative of having our dog with us and really enjoyed having a place that fits our needs of the weekend.
The kitchen island with 5 stools was awesome for hanging out and catching up with our group at the end of every night. Kitchen was well stocked with everything we needed. Beds and bathroom were comfy and stocked also stocked well.
I loved all the photos included with check-in instructions to simplify the process. I feel this is a great value and photos/descriptions match the listing. We would stay here again & definitely recommend to others :)
Aiden was great to work with.
Great guy , friendly easy communication, respectful,
Nice stay if you’re in the area for a couple of days. Heater works great and bed was comfortable.
The place is just as pictured! Super adorable with everything you need. The beds are very comfortable, which made our week stay even better. I highly recommend staying here, it was perfect!
Nice place to stay. Would stay there again.
Great host. Easy instructions and communicated very well. I would definitely stay there again.
Super cozy space, felt right at home!
It was exactly what we needed.
Within walking distance of everywhere, but off the beaten path. No traffic. Loved the open space feel and especially the popcorn popper!
Great stay! Lovely neighborhood and host! We will be back!

Cute and cozy Airbnb. Short drive to a beautiful park off Lake Winnebago. The home is located central to a lot of popular tourist destinations/parks which is exactly why we picked it. Airbnb had 2 wall ac units which worked great. It was easy to find and had plenty of parking.
Thanks!
It was a very comfortable stay! Big beds, nice shower! Very cute!
We found this place to be a place we could look forward to returning to each day. Felt home like after a day.

Super cute apartment! Clean, comfortable and most of all affordable.
The unit was kept cool by the AC units. Bed was amazing and super comfortable. Overall we loved this adorable apartment for our weekend get away.
Neighborhood was quiet and close to everything.

Aidan’s place was great, we enjoyed our stay very much! The a/c’s kept the apartment very cool and everything was as described. We felt very comfortable there and it was super clean with all the utensils needed to cook anything you need. Overall great place to stay!

We booked this rental because it was close to Oshkosh for the air show. It was nice to come back after a long day and sit and relax in this home. The beds were large and comfortable. I have a hard time sleeping even at home and I slept like a rock both nights. Having the laundry room available was a bonus. I was able to come back home and have one less thing to do as a busy mom.
I stayed at the house for Oshkosh and will probably book next year! The air conditioning was very nice for the hot weather. Host is extremely responsive and helpful.

This cozy house was exactly as expected, located in a neighborhood just a couple blocks from Lake Winnebago and close to the event we were attending. My husband & I felt right at home with all the amenities and comforts we could want. The rooms were spacious and the bed we slept on was VERY comfortable. The 2nd BR has an enormous CA King which looked equally inviting if you have more travelers. The kitchen is stocked with everything you need. The bathroom was spacious, clean & updated. It was quiet and so inviting that we brought our local friends over to see it in case they had Oshkosh visitors in the future. We highly recommend this property!
I also want to add: there were no bugs, it smelled wonderful, the bed was super comfy, it was quiet, and the window air conditioners kept the space very cool...exactly the opposite of the negative comments left by a previous guest. The driveway is narrow (it's stated in the description) but we maneuvered it quite well in our full sized SUV.
Clean, comfy, homey. Only wish there would have been complimentary coffee available. Otherwise, it was fantastic!
Clean and comfortable. Excellent communication.

Had just a quick one night stay at Aidan's place, and didn't need anything too over-the-top as we were going to be out and about most of the time.
The place looked as it did in the photos, and in a quiet neighborhood. Good price compared to some of the surrounding options!
What Boyd said

Cute place 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom house. Nice size kitchen with table and chairs at the kitchen bar. Window air conditioning unit cooled the kitchen at living room nicely. The bedrooms had large standing fans and ceiling fans to help with cooling the rooms. Good parking in the backyard. Within walking distance of the lake. Overall cute house, nice, quiet location.
Had such an amazing time staying at Aidan’s place. Very clean, spacious and comfortable! Thank you letting us stay at your home!
Stayed for a weekend in June. Clean space and Aidan was very responsive to any questions I had. Not much to say, but I was satisfied with my stay.

We had a great stay at Aidan’s place. It was exactly as described in a quiet neighborhood close to the lake, with everything we needed for an extended stay. The beds were extremely comfy, great WiFi, huge tv, washer and dryer, and convenient parking right outside the back door. We cook a lot and the kitchen was well appointed with all the basics and then some. Aidan was quick to respond to questions and we had zero problems during our long stay. Highly recommend!

Aidans place was so cute, airy and welcoming! Close to the lake and walking trail as well as a quick drive to Main Street, which has lots of great restaurants and local shops! Loved my quick stay at Aidans place!

It was a great place to stay and perfect for what we needed it for. Felt right at home. Definitely recommend staying here if you’re ever in the area! If you’re traveling with a boat, the driveway was a little tight for it but we made it work! Either way it was a great experience.

I enjoyed my stay at Mark's home. It was beautifully decorated, clean and had all the amenities needed for a stay. Check in was simple with clear instructions ahead of time. I was able to concentrate on work while there...which was much appreciated.
Nice place and clean. Thank you for letting us stay with our Great Dane.
Great stay! Thanks for hosting!
Such a cozy home! Very clean and beautifully decorated. Would recommend staying at Mark’s place!

Great house and very helpful host. There are about three parking spots end to end in the driveway, which is good, because despite the lack of signs on the street, the city tickets for street parking without a permit.
Always a pleasure staying at Marks properties while visiting the area for work.

Mark's place on Oak St had eye-catching accessories & was clean. He had everything necessary for our stay to be comfortable. The place was short a couple items for our lenghty stay. We contacted Mark who had the items sent over within a couple hours.
The house was exactly how it was described by home owner. Loved how peaceful the community is as well. Interior is lovely and amenities are well described as well. I would stay at Marks place again.
Very nice home and comfortable beds
Great stay
The place was spacious, nice and clean. My wife and I, including our fur babies enjoyed our stay. Mark also has great recommendations, don’t hesitate to book.

We fell in love with Wisconsin! Mark’s place was so cute and well cared for. The fan in the bedroom and complementary box of chocolates were a nice touch. The coffee was our favorite. Thanks for having us!
Thanks for the nice stay and for accommodating our needs!

Mark was responsive. When I questioned him wanting to me to log into a third party website to get check-in info, he adjusted so that I could access the info without needing to input my personal info. The location and neighborhood were good, as was the cute little house. Nice TV. We enjoyed walking around the area.
However, when we entered, there was a strong smell of cigarette smoke, even though the house rules adamantly state no smoking. There were 3 Glade Plug-ins throughout the house and they made the smell worse. We opened all the windows. We stayed 2 nights and had to wash all of our clothes afterwards to get out the smoke smell, even items we had not worn. A box of chocolates for us looked like it had been there for months. Many pieces of furniture had stains. The beds did not have mattress pads and the pillows did not have pillow protectors. The sheets and blankets were synthetic fabrics that did not breathe. The cushions on the deck furniture were ripped and falling apart.

Great choices
Things to do nearby:
The house was impeccably clean. It had snowed prior to our arrival and Mark sent someone right away to clear the snow
This place was heaven sent for our trip. We booked it last minute. It felt like we were in a very pristine house and slept like kings and queens on the beds.

Mark's place is great. Just a block away from the lake and a 5 minute drive to downtown restaurants. It snowed several times while I was there, he was great about making the drive way and stairs to the home clear of snow and ice. The kitchen is great, good range of cookware and tools. We enjoyed our stay very much.
I unfortunately had to cancel but Mark refunded me about a third of what I paid

Great comfortable stay in Oshkosh!
Did not have some of the amenities listed, but was quick to bring them over to us once informed. Wonderful service!
Thank you so much for a great stay!
Mark was easy to work with and place was very nice and cozy.
Very nice stay…. No problems at all. Would definitely stay there again.

Amazing cozy me and the kids felt right at home beds were so comfy great location we walked to the park perfect parking space love the stove was amazing
To cook on all around amazing would recommend and will return in future thank you !
Wonderful place, would stay again!

It was great to be back in my hometown. The rooms were comfortable, clean, and there were endless little extras like food and drinks in the refrigerator. You could really tell that they thought of everything and we really appreciated it. We will definitely be staying here again if it's available. There is also a very nice little park with ponds and fountains nearby. Everything was just lovely.
She responded right away and was very attentive. Her place was extremely clean and accommodating.
Best night sleep since being on the road and traveling for work 10/10 would recommend

Very nice, quiet, comfortable place to stay. More spacious than expected. Delightful, thoughtful, convenient breakfast and snack items are an added plus! We have already booked another stay here for a future trip.
Cozy, clean and quiet. Rose was very responsive and helpful if anything was needed. Great extra touches to make it feel like home!

This is the second time we’ve stayed ! Same Great experience as last year. Quiet , clean , had everything we needed , plus the milk , juice and gluten free cereal snacks were so helpful , so that we didn’t need to bring coolers up the stairs !! WiFi worked great, and was important cause I needed to do some remote work there . Neighbor was also very friendly and showed us some newborn kittens 😊. Next trip we hope to have time to sit on deck and explore the park that’s about a block away . Thanks Rose 😊
It was all the little things! She was so communicative and nice! Will stay again!
Rose’s place was just as described. A simple, comfortable, clean place with plenty of thoughtful touches for guests to enjoy. Perfect for our one night stay. Thank you for being so thoughtful, Rose.
Great extra amenities- stocked with snacks and easy access to all the streaming options!

Everything was great. The only downside was that the shower drain was a bit clotted so there was a puddle that build up. Besides that Rose’s place felt super homey and it had everything that I needed. I also appreciate all the little things in the bathroom cabinet. I forgot my dry shampoo and there was some for me. Thanks for the quick breakfast & drinks!
Absolutely lovely, clean, quiet. Rose was very responsive and helpful. Will definitely stay again.
Rose was very responsive to ensure I enjoyed my stay. Everything was clean and I loved the added touches of coffee, soda, and snacks in the kitchen! Would definitely stay again when I'm back in town.

wonderful location and great hosts.
the place was clean and pristine. so quiet also.
great experience!!

Rose had a lovely place. It had better amenities than the hotel we stayed at the night before. It was my first place, I've been to that offered snacks. So cool! Wish we spent more time there but it served it's purpose for a çrash spot. Highly recommend.
Great place, would return!
Rose’s place exceeded my expectations. It was such a beautiful home and she made sure we were taken care of prior to our check in. I cannot recommend this stay enough!

They place was very clean. I liked food beverages and breakfast items. I also like the many personal hygiene and bathroom products available. Rose was very nice and accommodating. The parking spot is a tight fit with a large SUV. It was a little difficult to find the street numbers at night even though the porch light on.
We stay every year as I do a craft show near there annually. What a surprise to find the pajama pants that I left there last year sitting on the table. Thank you Rose for a wonderful stay!
Visited Oshkosh to attend UWO Homecoming. Nice, nearby location. Thanks, Rose!
Cozy place that felt like home! (Only it was cleaner and had better snacks👏🏼)

Unfortunately we only got to stay for one night, but it was the perfect pit-stop for the night. Very homey and extremely comfortable beds! Had everything we could ever need. Wish we could have stayed longer :)

This was our third time staying with Rose and Donn. As always, they were incredibly responsive and detail-oriented. They even fixed an issue with the window while we were out so we would stay comfortable. Great hosts and a great home!

Recently stayed at this AirBnb with my father as we were traveling from out of state for sporting event the next day. This was a perfect overnight stop for the two of us. Fit perfectly for what we needed. As others have noted, there were snacks and beverages available in the kitchen. Rose messaged us to make sure everything was ok upon arrival. Simply put, I would definitely stay here again.

We were so thankful to find Rose's place to spend the night in Oshkosh for a friend's wedding! She had the parking spot and entrance clearly marked which made check-in very easy, and the space was clean and cozy. The addition of snacks was truly a treat, and the amenities were ideal for our brief stay! Rose was responsive to communicate with and helpful with anything we needed! Highly recommend staying here!

Rose & Donn were super welcoming and sweet, definitely made us feel welcome even when we arrived late due to traveling. Rose was very responsive. As everyone else mentioned, the snacks in the kitchen were an amazing addition to this place, especially when we had such an early flight when leaving; having a snack was an absolute day changer. Wonderful place, if we ever end up in the area again we’ll be sure to be back!
This was a return trip to Rose’s. We enjoyed the quiet neighborhood with a nice city park only a short walk away. Great host with many extras to make our stay very enjoyable. Thanks again.

rose's place includes the entire upstairs of an old refurbished house in downtown oshkosh. you have everything right there--large bedroom w/2 beds, kitchen which is well furnished and has cereal, milk, drinks etc. bath is clean. there is also a living/eating area. the neighborhood is peaceful and has an historic vibe. there is a nice backyard if you want to spend time outside. its very centrally located, for example the eaa site is just 5 minutes away.
the place is good value, but unfortunately the taxes are (to me) shockingly high. i guess its the way oshkosh funds its government! not rose's fault.
didnt meet rose, but had quite interesting chats with donn. he is a wealth of information and a very nice fellow.

Rose and Donn are exemplary hosts. They have thought of everything that a guest might need and stocked the apartment accordingly. They have also stocked with snacks and breakfast items. All around above and beyond!!
Lovely space within walking distance of the river. Lots of little extras (snacks, toiletries etc) and really helpful hosts.

the space was both inviting and adorable. plenty of space for two people to share. it was quiet, and contained all the basics you might not get at a hotel, that you have in your home. great stay, thank u
Was really great
Great place to stay. Will be back!
Felt right at home. Cold drinks and snacks we’re available upon my arrival.
Everything about Rose’s place is great!
Very friendly host. Great place for me and my daughter to stay. While the house itself was quiet there were some noises (from the apartment building) across the road that were a bit disruptive.

If you’re ever in the Oshkosh area, this is the place to stay. I have stayed at lots of Airbnb’s and this one by far was so nice she had breakfast items, snacks any little essential that you may need she had it great details will definitely be back.
Good place to stay in the area. Convenient to roads.
I was positively surprised when I look around inside. Lot of small but very useful things was ready. I almost feel like home. Thanks.
great spot for a short stay in Oshkosh. comfortable and quiet.
Rosie’s communication was excellent. She thinks of every little detail to make our stay awesome. This is a great place to stay at an excellent value. Thank you Rosie for opening up your home to us.
Wonderful and quiet place! Enjoyed our stay!

Loved this cozy place. Rose had snacks and breakfast options available for us. The place was clean and welcoming. The beds were comfortable and the neighborhood was quiet. Walked to the nearby park on the morning. Loved it!

Rose and Donn were excellent hosts . Their upstairs large 2 room with 3/4 bath apartment was just what my daughter and I needed for an overnight stay between events at UW Oshkosh ! Very comfortable beds / chairs . Well stocked kitchen and they even had breakfast cereals , juice , milk , bananas snacks ! My daughter is a celiac and was thrilled that they had GF cereal and chips !! Special Thanks Donn for promptly unlocking the upper door lock that I accidentally engaged on midst luggage loading trips to car . Looking forward to returning 😊🙏

In all of her communications Rose’s friendly and welcoming tone was evident and this was felt when we entered into her upstairs dwelling. The beds were warm and comfortable, and the two large rooms were furnished and laid out so thoughtfully. And then there were the snacks and breakfast options (which we enjoyed leisurely in the pleasant dining area) that just put it over the top.
Thanks, Rose!!!

Rose’s place is a charming upstairs apartment in an older home. It has everything you need and it’s quite roomy, with lots of different places to sit. It’s very quiet and comfortable. Breakfast is provided, which is very thoughtful. I was in town fir a conference at UW Oshkosh, which was just a short drive. I enjoyed this apartment very much.
Ms. Rose and Don were amazing hosts. The apt was so comfy and clean. It was just what I was hoping for.
Great place in exactly the right spot to explore Oshkosh or have a quiet stay.
Rose is a responsive and friendly host. Our stay was comfortable and quiet. Perfect for our needs.
Very responsive host. I had a great visit with my son in a comfy, cozy space.

It’s a second time I’m staying here with my friend while fishing on Winnebago.
Nice budget place
Will come back
Thanks Rose!
Neat cute place. Rose communicated well. liked the continental type breakfast and drinks in the fridge.
I really enjoyed my stay in this quiet, cozy, clean, comfortable home. if I ever return to Oshkosh I will be back! they had great snacks!
Rose was a great host, and her home is one of the best AirBnbs I have stayed in! She has thought of everything to make your stay comfortable. I hope to stay again!

Absolutely loved this airbnb. Would highly recommend it. Cozy room, great beds, and the stocked fridge was amazing. We didn't have time to shop because we got in late so the milk and cereal were a wonderful surprise. You are probably the best host ever! The small touches made our stay great! Thank you!!
The first thing I noticed was all of those extra touches that made you feel comfortable as soon as you walked in. I was only there for a short time, but it was perfect. I would reserve again!!
Feels just like home! Rose had snacks and beverages provided. The rooms are spacious and clean. The beds are comfortable. I highly recommend staying here.
Rose is a great host with a great place in downtown Oshkosh! I would absolutely stay there again!
Nice quaint upstairs apartment very private & would love to make another trip sometime.

A very charming upstairs apartment. Rose provided very quick responses to messages. She also provides thoughtful amenities such as snacks, an assortment of beverages and breakfast items. We really appreciated that. We will definitely stay again if we are in the area.

Rosie's place has everything we need for a stay in Oshkosh. From a well equipped kitchen for making meals to the extras like coffee, breakfast food, snacks and beverages the hosts truly made our visit warm and welcoming.
Second time staying in this cute little well supplied space. Will be back next year!
I really enjoyed the stay here! Very clean and welcoming! Would definitely stay here again!
It was a great place to stay - very nice folks! They care for you like family!
For the price and the space it is very worth it. She even left food and drinks for you to drink just lovely.
We thoroughly enjoyed our second stay at Rose's. It is cozy and clean, and the amenities provided by Rose are greatly appreciated. We plan to make this an annual trip and Rose's is the perfect place!
